src:
Odin forvaltning ökar i Biotage
Norska Odin Forvaltning har ökat sitt ägande i Biotage till drygt 3,6 miljoner aktier eller 5,6 procent av kapital och röster i bioteknikbolaget.
06 Nov 2019, 14:57 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Odin's management is increasing in Biotage
The Norwegian Odin Forvaltning has increased its ownership in Biotage to just over 3.6 million shares or 5.6 percent of the capital and votes in the biotechnology company.
06 Nov 2019, 14:57 by News Agency Direct
